description: A creative application of the Gomu Gomu no Mi where Luffy wraps his stretchy limbs around an enemy Marine and controls them like a puppet, forcing them to attack their own allies.
firstUseContext: Luffy uses this technique to confuse and defeat Marines at Enies Lobby's main gate during his solo assault.
effectiveness: Highly effective for crowd control and causing confusion among enemy ranks.
weaknesses: Requires Luffy to maintain physical contact with the controlled Marine, limiting his mobility.

name.english: Rope Action: Figure of Eight Knot
name.japanese: ロープアクション：八の字結び
name.romanized: Rōpu Akushon: Hachi no Ji Musubi

description: Paulie's rope-based fighting technique that uses a figure-eight knot pattern to bind and restrain multiple opponents simultaneously. Drawing on his expertise as a shipwright, Paulie can quickly tie complex knots to immobilize enemies.
firstUseContext: Paulie uses this technique to restrain a group of Marines at Enies Lobby's main gate.
effectiveness: Very effective for restraining multiple opponents and controlling the battlefield.
weaknesses: Requires skill and precision; less effective against opponents who can cut or break ropes.
